revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Letters from the Marchioness de Sévigné to her daughter the Countess de Grignan. (Marie de Rabutin-Chantal Sévigné, marquise de). 10v. (Dublin : Printed for Henr..."
revision.text: Possibly: Letters from the Marchioness de Sévigné to her daughter the Countess de Grignan. (Marie de Rabutin-Chantal Sévigné, marquise de). 10v. (Dublin : Printed for Henry Saunders and J. Williams, 1768). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/11396552
